description: This file defines a React functional component named Header that renders a top navigation bar. The navigation adapts based on the authentication state, showing different links when the user is logged in or out. It imports React, react-router-dom components, and a custom AuthContext hook to manage authentication-related behavior.

methods.name: Header()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the top navigation header with conditional links based on authentication status.

methods.name: onLogout
methods.description: Handles user logout by calling signOut and navigating to login page.
